name: Ivysaur

passive.name: Deep Roots
passive.effect: Whenever you attach a Grass Energy to a Pokemon, you may search your discard pile for a Grass Energy, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

attacks.name: Poison Powder
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

flavor: These Pokemon are not only good for the forest, they are often the centers of them.
